title: Explosive Substances Act,1908
description: Official consolidated text of Explosive Substances Act,1908 (VI of 1908) published by The Pakistan Code (General Laws).

provisions.title: Section 1. Short title, and extent
provisions.content:
_(1) This Act may be called the Explosive Substances Act,1908.
2
[(2) It extends to the whole of Pakistan.]

provisions.title: Section 2. Definition of “explosive substance”. In this Act the expression “explosive substance” shall
provisions.content:
be deemed to include any materials for making any explosive substance ; also any apparatus, machine
implement or material used, or intended to be used, or adapted for causing, or aiding in causing, any
explosion in or with any explosive substance; also any part of any such apparatus, machine or
implement.

provisions.title: Section 3. Punishment for causing explosion likely to endanger life or property. Any person who
provisions.content:
unlawfully and maliciously causes by any explosive substance an explosion of a nature likely to
endanger life or to cause serious injury to property shall, whether any injury to person or property has
been actually caused or not, be punished with 3[death or imprisonment for life].

provisions.title: Section 5. Punishment for making or possessing explosives under suspicious circumstances. Any
provisions.content:
person who makes or knowingly has in his possession or under his control any explosive substance,
under such circumstances as to give rise to a reasonable suspicion that he is not making it or does not
have it in his possession or under his control for a lawful object, shall, unless he can show that he made
it or had it in his possession or under his control for a lawful object, be punishable with 3[imprisonment
for a term which may extend to fourteen years].
4[5A. Forfeiture of property. A Court convicting a person for an offence against this Act shall
direct that the whole of his property shall stand forfeited to Government.]

provisions.title: Section 6. Punishment of abettors. Any person who by the supply of or solicitation for money, the
provisions.content:
providing of premises, the supply of materials, or in any manner whatsoever, procures, counsels, aids,
abets, or is accessory to, the commission of any offence under this Act shall be punished with the
punishment provided for the offence.

provisions.title: Section 7. Restriction on trial of offences. No Court shall proceed to the trial of any person for an
provisions.content:
offence against this Act except with the consent of 5 * * * the 6[Provincial Government] 7[to which
intimation shall be sent within two days of the registration of the case] 7[:]
7
[Provided that if the consent is neither received nor refused within sixty days of the registration
of case by the Government such consent shall be deemed to have been duly given.]
